price: 85. Mpe apambolami ye oyo azali na bokonzi ya nsé na ya likolo, na maye ezali okati na yango, mpe ye nde azali na boyebi ya tango ya suka. Mpe epai naye nde bokozongisama.
arabic: وَتَبَارَكَ ٱلَّذِي لَهُۥ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَا وَعِندَهُۥ عِلۡمُ ٱلسَّاعَةِ وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: watabāraka alladhī lahu mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wamā baynahumā waʿindahu ʿil'mu al-sāʿati wa-ilayhi tur'jaʿūna
